description: Discover supported verification scopes and the claims they provide. Initiate and monitor data wallet verification flows to securely receive redacted wallet data. Clean up completed sessions to keep workflows organized.

capabilities.name: get_supported_scopes
capabilities.description: Return supported scopes, the claims each scope returns, and available verifier profiles.

capabilities.name: start_wallet_verification
capabilities.description: Create a wallet request as a QR code image or deeplink.

capabilities.name: poll_wallet_verification
capabilities.description: Poll current status for a session; returns structured status and redacted wallet_data.

capabilities.name: revoke_wallet_flow
capabilities.description: Acknowledge cleanup for a session id (back-end TTL handles actual expiration).
